# StepActorFollow.apply() method

Applies the step by performing a follow operation. Requires the context to provide the `did` of the actor to follow.

**Signature:**

```typescript
apply(): Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

Error if no context is found.
